import React, { Component } from 'react' import soccerPlayer from '../../Images/soccerPlayer.gif' import {Button} from 'react-bootstrap' const Backdrop = props => { RemoveBackdrop=()=>this.props.setSt({ backdropVisibility:"hidden"}); return (
{this.props.mainstate.textOfBackdrop}
) } export default Backdrop;
